summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Law Department's Criminal Case Tracking System; decreasing the 1992 appropriation of the Data Processing Development Subfund of the Cumulative Reserve Fund and making a corresponding increase in the Capital Outlay appropriation of the 1992 Law Department budget; authorizing the borrowing of money and making an additional appropriation for the Law Department's budget; and authorizing the City Attorney to enter into an agreement to acquire the Criminal Case Tracking System; all upon a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
